did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Photographs of Edgemont, Albemarle County, VA 1950 and 1960

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Photographs of Edgemont, Albemarle County, VA, 1950 and 1960, Accession # 10831, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift of William B. O'Neal, Charlottesville, Virginia, through the courtesy of K. Edward Lay, Professor of Architecture at the University of Virginia, and was accessioned on April 20, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains ca. 80 black-and-white photographs of "Edgemont," Albemarle County, Virginia, taken by G. Corner Fenhagen (ca. 1940) and William B. O'Neal (ca. 1960). The later photographs are superior to the earlier photographs in clarity and in contrast, and the original negatives for fifteen of the later photographs are present.
